Pre-Game Insights: The Mets have shown resilience throughout the season, overcoming odds to reach the NLCS despite being underdogs.
The Dodgers have dominated the Mets in the series, with better pitching and offensive performance.
Post-Match Reflections: Mets players emphasized their determination to keep fighting despite the series deficit.
Francisco Lindor referenced previous comebacks, noting it's possible to win from a 3-1 series deficit.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets' unique team culture and fun moments contribute to their ability to stay positive.
The team's resilience and camaraderie have been key factors in their journey.
